title: Liverpool v Arsenal: Premier League updates – live
summary: Will Unwin provides live updates on the Premier League's most exciting match this weekend. Fans can expect minute-by-minute coverage of the key plays and highlights. Stay tuned for in-depth analysis and insights throughout the game.

title: Brighton v Manchester City: Premier League updates – live
summary: Tim de Lisle will provide live minute-by-minute coverage of the Premier League match between Brighton and Manchester City. Stay updated for real-time insights and analysis throughout the game. Fans can tune in to follow all the action as it unfolds.

title: Norway signs £10bn deal for anti-submarine warships built in UK
summary: The Ministry of Defence announced an agreement expected to create 4,000 jobs and bolster NATO's northern defense capabilities. This initiative aims to enhance security in the region. The agreement underscores the commitment to collective defense within the alliance.

title: Gruda fires late winner in Brighton’s comeback win over Manchester City
summary: Brajan Gruda netted a dramatic 89th-minute goal to secure a 2-1 victory for Brighton against Manchester City at the Amex Stadium. Brighton staged a comeback after initially trailing in the match. The win highlights Brighton's resilience and determination on home turf.

title: The Cracker Barrel mess exposes the cynicism of the rightwing culture war | Sidney Blumenthal
summary: Activists view the restaurant primarily as a means to target opponents and showcase conservative influence. It serves as a symbol rather than a significant establishment to them. The focus lies more on its role in the political landscape than on its culinary offerings.
